sentences.en: And then all ties were irksome, all earthly attachments unnecessary.
sentences.cn: 于是,一切联系都是讨厌的, 所有尘世的依附都无必要了.

sentences.en: In the lunar calendar, the years are designated by the Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches.
It would be for peace, if I prayed for an earthly gift.
sentences.cn: 如果说我在祈求一项珍贵的礼物,那么它就是安宁.

sentences.en: Of love it may be said, the less earthly the less demonstrative.
sentences.cn: 关于爱,我们可以说, 越纯洁越含蓄.

sentences.en: she wouldn't stand an earthly if she tried to outrun him.
sentences.cn: 她要想超过他是毫无希望的。

sentences.en: The oblique rays of the sun on the orchards create this typical landscape that traditional iconography would associate with an earthly paradise.
sentences.cn: 阳光撒在果园里形成了独特的景致,就像传统肖像画中描绘的天堂.

sentences.en: the sorrows of this earthly life
Their team hasn't an earthly chance of winning.
sentences.cn: 他们球队根本不可能有机会赢.

sentences.en: There's no earthly reason for me to feel so blue.
sentences.cn: 我也说不出来为什么这么沮丧。

sentences.en: There's no earthly reason for us to bear the blame for them.
sentences.cn: 不可能有什么理由要我们代他们受过.

sentences.en: These paintings are in some ways a reminder that earthly pleasures are ephemeral.
sentences.cn: 这些画在某种意义上提醒人们世俗的享乐是短暂的。

sentences.en: They lived in an earthly paradise.
This was the substance quite of all real earthly good and delight.
sentences.cn: 这是所有真正的人间幸福与欢乐的实质.

sentences.en: You haven't an earthly chance of beating her at tennis — she is one of the best players in the country.
sentences.cn: 你根本不可能在网球赛中打败她─她是全国最好的选手之一.

sentences.en: You haven't an earthly chance to win the prize.
You've no earthly chance of driving from London to Bristol in under an hour.
sentences.cn: 你根本不可能在一小时内驱车从伦敦到达布里斯托尔.

words.tran_cn: 地球；陆地；泥土；尘世；[电] 地线

trans.tran_cn: 地球的，地上的，尘世的，世俗的，可能的
trans.tran_en: connected with life on Earth rather than in heaven
